mention.text: Seven prisoners released , seven gory heads on pikes , the keys of the accursed fortress of the eight strong towers , some discovered letters and other memorials of prisoners of old time , long dead of broken hearts , -- such , and such -- like , the loudly echoing footsteps of Saint Antoine escort through the Paris streets in mid-July , one thousand seven hundred and eighty-nine .
